question: Why are you going to the United States? (Aap United States kyun ja rahe hain?)
english: I am going for tourism and to attend convocation of Surbhi Meena in Seattle. She is doing masters from University of Washington in Seattle.
hinglish: Main tourism ke liye aur Surbhi Meena ki convocation attend karne Seattle ja raha hoon. Woh University of Washington, Seattle mein masters kar rahi hai.

question: When is she graduating? (Woh kab graduate ho rahi hai?)
english: In June 2026.
hinglish: June 2026 mein.

question: Is this for business, tourism, or both? (Kya yeh business, tourism, ya dono ke liye hai?)
english: This trip is for both tourism and to visit family.
hinglish: Yeh trip tourism aur family se milne, dono ke liye hai.

question: When do you plan to travel? (Aap kab travel karne ka plan kar rahe hain?)
english: I plan to travel on June 1, 2026.
hinglish: Main 1 June 2026 ko travel karne ka plan kar raha hoon.

question: How long will you stay? (Aap kitne din rukenge?)
english: I plan to stay for approximately three weeks, departing on June 20, 2026.
hinglish: Main lagbhag teen hafte rukunga, aur 20 June 2026 ko wapas aa jaunga.

question: Which cities will you visit? (Aap kaun se shehron mein jayenge?)
english: I will primarily be visiting Seattle, Washington.
hinglish: Main mainly Seattle, Washington jaunga.

question: Where will you stay? (Aap kahan rukenge?)
english: I will be staying with my relative, Surbhi Meena, at their residence in Seattle.
hinglish: Main apni rishtedar, Surbhi Meena, ke saath unke Seattle wale ghar mein rukunga.

question: Do you have friends or relatives in the US? (Kya aapke koi dost ya rishtedar US mein hain?)
english: Yes, I have a relative, Surbhi Meena, who resides in the US.
hinglish: Haan, meri ek rishtedar, Surbhi Meena, US mein rehti hai.

question: What is their status in the US? (Unka US mein kya status hai?)
english: My relative, Surbhi Meena, is on F1 (student visa) Visa in the US.
hinglish: Meri rishtedar, Surbhi Meena, US mein F1 (student visa) Visa status par hai.

question: How do you know them? (Aap unhe kaise jaante hain?)
english: Surbhi Meena is my relative.
hinglish: Surbhi Meena meri rishtedar hai.

question: Who will you stay with? (Aap kiske saath rukenge?)
english: I will be staying with my relative, Surbhi Meena.
hinglish: Main apni rishtedar, Surbhi Meena, ke saath rukunga.

question: Who will pay for your trip? (Aapke trip ka kharcha kaun uthayega?)
english: I will be paying for my own trip.
hinglish: Main apne trip ka kharcha khud uthayunga.

question: How much will the trip cost? (Trip ka kitna kharcha aayega?)
english: (This information is not explicitly available in the DS-160. You should be prepared to provide an estimated cost based on your travel plans, including flights, accommodation, food, and activities.)
hinglish: (Yeh information DS-160 mein nahi hai. Aapko apne travel plans ke hisaab se estimated cost batane ke liye ready rehna chahiye, jisme flights, accommodation, khana aur activities shamil hon.)

question: What is your monthly income? (Aapki monthly income kitni hai?)
english: My monthly income is 36,972 Indian Rupees.
hinglish: Meri monthly income 36,972 Indian Rupees hai.

question: Do you have savings for this trip? (Kya aapke paas is trip ke liye savings hain?)
english: Yes, I have personal savings to cover the expenses for this trip.
hinglish: Haan, mere paas is trip ke kharchon ke liye personal savings hain.

question: What do you do for work? (Aap kya kaam karte hain?)
english: I am a Principal Medical Officer at the Government General Hospital in Sawai Madhopur.
hinglish: Main Sawai Madhopur ke Government General Hospital mein Principal Medical Officer hoon.

question: Where do you work and what is your role? (Aap kahan kaam karte hain aur aapka role kya hai?)
english: I work at the Government General Hospital in Sawai Madhopur as a Principal Medical Officer. My duties include processing staff salaries, payroll records, maintaining employee service books, and managing official correspondence.
hinglish: Main Sawai Madhopur ke Government General Hospital mein Principal Medical Officer ke roop mein kaam karta hoon. Mere duties mein staff salaries, payroll records process karna, employee service books maintain karna, aur official correspondence manage karna shamil hai.

question: How long have you worked there? (Aap wahan kitne samay se kaam kar rahe hain?)
english: I have been working there since September 7, 2019.
hinglish: Main wahan 7 September 2019 se kaam kar raha hoon.

question: Do you have approved leave and when will you return? (Kya aapki chutti approved hai aur aap kab wapas aayenge?)
english: Yes, my leave is approved, and I will return to India by June 20, 2026, to resume my duties.
hinglish: Haan, meri chutti approved hai, aur main 20 June 2026 tak India wapas aa jaunga apni duties resume karne ke liye.

question: Which college and which course, when does your next semester start? (Aap kaun se college aur course mein hain, aur aapka agla semester kab shuru hoga?)
english: N/A (I am currently employed, not a student).
hinglish: Laagu nahi (Main abhi employed hoon, student nahi).

question: Why will you return to India after the trip? (Aap trip ke baad India wapas kyun aayenge?)
english: I will return to India to continue my government service as a Principal Medical Officer. I have strong professional and family ties in India, including my parent.
hinglish: Main India wapas aaunga apni sarkari seva Principal Medical Officer ke roop mein jaari rakhne ke liye. Mere India mein strong professional aur family ties hain, jisme mere parent shamil hain.
category: Ties to India and Return Plan

question: Do you have family in India? (Kya aapki family India mein hai?)
english: Yes, my parent, Devi Basanti, resides in India.
hinglish: Haan, meri parent, Devi Basanti, India mein rehti hai.
category: Ties to India and Return Plan

question: Do you have property or responsibilities in India? (Kya aapki India mein koi property ya zimmedariyan hain?)
english: (This information is not explicitly available in the DS-160. You should be prepared to mention any property, financial responsibilities, or other significant ties you have in India that demonstrate your intent to return.)
hinglish: (Yeh information DS-160 mein nahi hai. Aapko India mein apni property, financial responsibilities, ya anya important ties batane ke liye ready rehna chahiye jo aapki wapsi ki intent ko demonstrate karein.)
category: Ties to India and Return Plan

question: Have you traveled outside India before? (Kya aapne pehle kabhi India se bahar travel kiya hai?)
english: Yes, I have traveled to the UAE and Thailand before.
hinglish: Haan, main pehle UAE aur Thailand travel kar chuka hoon.

question: Have you been to the US before? (Kya aap pehle kabhi US gaye hain?)
english: No, I have not been to the US before.
hinglish: Nahi, main pehle kabhi US nahi gaya hoon.

question: Have you ever been refused a US visa or overstayed anywhere? (Kya aapko kabhi US visa refuse hua hai ya aap kahin overstay kiye hain?)
english: No, I have never been refused a US visa or overstayed anywhere.
hinglish: Nahi, mujhe kabhi US visa refuse nahi hua aur na hi main kahin overstay kiya hai.
